text: Thrifton is an unincorporated community in Ross County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== Thrifton was founded when the railroad was extended through the neighborhood. A post office called Thrifton was established in 1889, and remained in operation until 1891. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Ross County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Thrifton, Ohio
